content:
Ruben measured how many minutes he meditated each night and the number of hours he slept.
  
**Plot the data in a scatter plot.**
  
| | | | | | | 
:--|--:|--:|--:|--:|--:|--:|--:|--:|--:|--:
**Meditation (minutes)** | $4$ | $8$ | $10$ | $4$ | $18$ | $4$
**Sleep (hours)** | $4.5$ | $9.5$ | $8.5$ | $6$ | $10$ | $7$
